rules.description: Better modifiers to reach them all with the thumbs

manipulators.description: Change spacebar to left_command. (Post escape if pressed alone)
Change right_command to right_shift. (Post return_or_enter if pressed alone)
Change left_command to left_shift. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
Change right_option to right_option. (Post right_parenthesis if pressed alone)
Change left_option to left_control. (Post left_parenthesis if pressed alone)
